name: MotoGP19
description:
MotoGP™19 celebrates passion for motorsports with many new features!
With the Historical Challenges mode you can relive the most exciting rivalries that made the history of the MotoGP™!

Compete with a faster, smarter and more accurate AI based on machine learning!

Play with your favorite 2019 Championship rider and race on 19 different tracks! Discover all the classes: MotoGP™, Moto2™, Moto3™, Red Bull MotoGP™ Rookies Cup and the new MotoE™.

Create your style and customize your helmet, lower back patch and racing number with the new graphic editors!

Improve your bike's performance working on different technical aspects during dedicated tests and plan your strategy to be the best!
